title.en: Prayer for the Flourishing of the Dzogchen Teachings of Sogyal Rinpoche, the Incarnation of Lerab Lingpa

text.en: Emaho! Beginningless and endless is the expanse that is free from the duality of samsara and nirvana,
text.en-trans: emaho, khordé nyimé tokta dralwé long

text.en: Self-arisingprimordial purity,the all-pervading great sphere of reality—
text.en-trans: rangjung kadak nyam dal tiklé ché

text.en: You are the body of unchanging clear light, endowed with three unique aspects,1
text.en-trans: khyechö sumden ö migyurwé ku

text.en: Samantabhadra, who transcends all activity, to you we pray!
text.en-trans: jadral kuntuzang la solwa deb

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings so that we realize the natural state of Dzogpachenpo!
text.en-trans: dzogchen neluk tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: Within this unmoving space shines the unceasing radiance
text.en-trans: yowa mé lé gakpa mepé dang

text.en: Ofspontaneous presence,the arisings of interdependence.
text.en-trans: lhündrub tenjung char nang malü kün

text.en: By realizing them all to be the appearances of the Ground, at that very instant
text.en-trans: zhi nang yinpar tokpé ké chik la

text.en: You attain perfect enlightenment, with its six special features.
text.en-trans: khyechö druk gi ngönpar sangyé pé

text.en: To you, the primordial buddha Samantabhadra, we pray!
text.en-trans: tokmé kuntuzang la solwa deb

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings so that we realize the natural state of Dzogpachenpo!
text.en-trans: dzogchen neluk tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: From your wisdom mind, all-pervading just like space,
text.en-trans: gang tuk khyab dal namkha tabu lé

text.en: Dawns the play of compassion, omnipresent, in forms of every kind,
text.en-trans: künkhyab tukjé rolpa chiryang nang

text.en: Opening limitless doors to the Dharma, profound and vast,
text.en-trans: zab dang gyachen chögo tayepa

text.en: And performing the wondrous enlightened actions that tame each according to their needs.
text.en-trans: gang la gang dul dzepa mejung ba

text.en: To all these appearances of the self-arisen vajra, we pray!
text.en-trans: rangjung dorjé nangwar solwa deb

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings so that we realize the natural state of Dzogpachenpo!
text.en-trans: dzogchen neluk tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: The enlightened mind transcends concepts and never knows transition or change,
text.en-trans: trödral tuk la pogyur ma chi kyang

text.en: Yet still, like stars and planets reflected on the limpid surface of a lake,
text.en-trans: dangwé tso la zakar jizhin du

text.en: In the single vision of non-duality, there appear the countless forms
text.en-trans: gongzhi nyimé chik la dumar nang

text.en: Of the buddhas of the five families, the three bodhisattva lords,
text.en-trans: gyalwa rik nga rik sum gönpo sok

text.en: And all the gatherings of naturally appearing, self-arising emanations.
text.en-trans: rangjung rangshar trulpé khor tsok la

text.en: To you we pray: transform our minds, our very being, with your grace!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings so that we realize the natural state of Dzogpachenpo!
text.en-trans: dzogchen neluk tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: Garab Dorjé and Mañjuśrīmitra,
text.en-trans: garab dorjé jampal shenyen dang

text.en: Śrī Siṃha, Jñānasūtra and Vimalamitra,
text.en-trans: shrising jnanasutra bimala

text.en: Guru Tsokyé Dorjé, ‘the Lake-born Vajra,’ whose kindness is beyond compare,
text.en-trans: kadrin dadral tsokyé dorjé sok

text.en: All you vidyādhara gurus in the three transmission lineages,
text.en-trans: gyü sum rigdzin lama malü dang

text.en: And the very embodiment of all sources of refuge, our root lama,
text.en-trans: kyabné kündü tsawé lama la

text.en: To you we pray: transform our minds, our very being, with your grace!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings so that we realize the natural state of Dzogpachenpo!
text.en-trans: dzogchen neluk tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In this time of turmoil, you are our supreme guide, King of the Śākyas.
text.en-trans: tsöden dü kyi dren chok shakyé gyal

text.en: Now that the warm breath of your teachings has still not evaporated,
text.en-trans: gang gi zhal sung drö lang mayalwar

text.en: And the Vajrayāna teachings remain in this age of good fortune,
text.en-trans: drebü tenpa nepé dü zang dir

text.en: May the teachings of the Ancient Translation school,
text.en-trans: khen lob chö sum trulpé lo pen gyi

text.en: Passed down through the kindness of Śāntarakṣita, Padmasambhava, Tri Songdetsen and the emanated translators and scholars,
text.en-trans: drin lé lek tob ngagyur gyalwé ten

text.en: Never wane, but like the sun high up in the sky,
text.en-trans: mi nub kha la nyishar jizhin du

text.en: May they shine and spread and flourish far and wide!
text.en-trans: chok dü küntu dar zhing gyé gyur chik

text.en: The very heart of the Ngagyur Nyingma teachings is the Dzogpachenpo,
text.en-trans: ngagyur tenpé nyingpo dzogpa ché

text.en: The natural state of the sugatagarbha, just as it is,
text.en-trans: der shek nyingpö neluk jizhinpa

text.en: Revealed directly through this supreme, unerring path,
text.en-trans: ngönsum tönpé lam chok manorwa

text.en: Spoken spontaneously by the Lake-born Vajra, Guru Rinpoche.
text.en-trans: tsokyé dorjé zhal lang tol lewa

text.en: May the teachings and practice of this Clear Light Vajra Essence
text.en-trans: ösal dorjé nyingpö shedrub dé

text.en: Blaze up and spread to every land!
text.en-trans: chok dü tadru küntu bar gyur chik

text.en: One who holds the lineage of these Ancient Translation teachings is the incarnation of Lerab Lingpa,
text.en-trans: ngagyur tenpé gyü dzin leling gi

text.en: Whose manner of teaching and practice, of study, contemplation and meditation, is full of vigour and energy.
text.en-trans: shedrub tö sam gompé langtso chen

text.en: May the masters and disciples who maintain this very tradition
text.en-trans: dzin dzé la lob kün gyi tukgyü la

text.en: Receive the actual blessings of the lamas of the three transmissions.
text.en-trans: gyü sum lamé jinlab ngön zhuk né

text.en: Then may our minds instinctively turn away from the eight worldly concerns,
text.en-trans: chö gyé di la zhenpa rang lok té

text.en: And, with humility, contentment and integrity,
text.en-trans: nyamchung chok shé kha dön tsungpa yi

text.en: By emulating the lives of the great masters of the past,
text.en-trans: dampa gongmé nam tar jé zin né

text.en: As the lovely orchard of the Dzogchen teachings bursts into bloom,
text.en-trans: dzogchen tenpé gatsal rabgyé shing

text.en: May we be infused with their blessings, so that we can pick and enjoy its inmost fruit!
text.en-trans: nyingpö drebu lönpar jingyi lob

text.en: As for the supreme being Sogyal Rinpoche, who upholds the teachings here,
text.en-trans: khyepar zhing di tendzin kyechok gi

text.en: May his merit(Sönam)remain forever stable as a mountain,
text.en-trans: sönam mingyur riwo zhindu ten

text.en: May his life remain forever firm within the vajra ground,
text.en-trans: kutsé mingyur takten dorjé zhir

text.en: And, blessed by those who have attained the power of longevity,
text.en-trans: tsewang drubpa nam kyi jinlab né

text.en: May he raise the victory banner(Gyaltsen)of the teachings to the very summit of existence,
text.en-trans: tenpé gyaltsen sitser dreng dzé ching

text.en: And may his teachings remain for ages to come, spreading forever further and further!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün né yündu gyé gyur chik
